Roles & Responsibilities
Roles & Responsibilities

The Special Education Teacher:
The Special Education Teacher:

◼ Assists in maintaining records of meeting procedures ◼ Assists in conducting necessary evaluations ◼ Assists committee in determining eligibility ◼ Provides input in the development of the IEP ◼ Implements IEP ◼ Provides input about the child’s progress
